General.Name: Podium Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Podium Minerals Limited operates as an exploration and resource development company in Australia. The company primarily explores for platinum group metals, such as platinum, palladium, rhodium, and iridium; and nickel, copper, cobalt, and gold deposits. Its primary project is the Parks Reef project covering an area of 77 square kilometers over the Weld Range Complex located in the Mid-West region of Western Australia. The company was formerly known as Weld Range Metals Limited. Podium Minerals Limited was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Subiaco, Australia.
